projects.title: AR Spells
projects.summary: An interactive augmented reality game on Microsoft’s Hololens which combines a tower-defense style game with a crafting system to create spells using tangibles.
description: “AR Spells” is an interactive augmented reality game on Microsoft’s Hololens which combines a tower-defense style game with a crafting system to create spells using tangibles.
The goal of our work was to build an augmented reality application with tangible interactions using Hololens.
We propose “AR Spells” a game where the user can interact with a augmented reality map by killing the monsters using tangible interaction to select the right spell.
The paper retraces the creation of the application from the source of its conception to its technological design.
The project was presented during the 2019 exhibition from students of the Master in Human Computer Interaction and Design.
The evaluation and possible evolution imagined after this exhibition are presented as well.

projects.title: Nuages ordonnées
projects.summary: Un environnement numérique qui peut être modifié et même perturbé directement de par nos mouvements. Un nuage sensible à son entourage, interagit avec notre silhouette, mute et se métamorphose entre ordre et désordre apparent pour s’adapter au mieux possible à nos actions. Qui crée le désordre ?
